turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, would you go to Starbucks and get me a size Venti Ice Caramel Macchiato with 2% milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I will, what area is the specific store located at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please go to the Starbucks on 69040 Ramon Rd Ste. A, Cathedral City, CA 92234.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, did you want to customize your order in any way?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, just ask for a Venti Ice Caramel Macchiato with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to let you know Starbucks has 6 options for the milk on you order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks for letting me know, I'll like 2% milk this time with my Venti Ice Caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I'll keep that in mind next time although let me know if you want a different milk option.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll let you know if I want to try something different, thanks for letting me know.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What utensils do you need from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Only a straw please, go through the drive through to save time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah its usually faster especially at Starbucks on 69040 Ramon Rd Ste. A, Cathedral City, CA 92234.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I agree, I'm craving the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Before I place the order, to be certain its only Venti Ice Caramel macchiato with 2% milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I placed the order and its asking about tipping, would you like to leave a tip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you I'm fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order placed on Starbucks at 69040 Ramon Rd Ste. A, Cathedral City, CA 92234.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, everything worked as it should.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, the order confirmation will be sent as mobile phone text message to you and I'll pick it up when its ready shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, have a safe trip.
